divs: Sighting DetailsWe were at a high school football game looking at the big, low, orange moon when my dad said, look at those lights. He said two went together from west to east and the third came from a slightly different angle, intercepted, joined the other two, and they all three proceeded until they were out of view. He said he had never seen anything move that fast except a missile. He held up his finger and thumb in an open V-shape and said they were bird-shaped. We were facing east. The moon was low in the sky about 10 o'clock angle and the lights were went over our heads from about 5 o'clock to 1 o'clock. On the way home I asked if they were as bright as the headlights coming toward us. Dad said know, they were neon, white.
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around October 26th 2007
Summary: 3 bright, white-neon, bird-shaped lights sped through the sky after dusk in Sacramento, CA
